name: WarehouseReference
description: order-service reference to Warehouse entity contract via local cache table

requiredFields.name: id
requiredFields.description: Warehouse unique identifier - primary key in warehouse_cache, used to join with orders

requiredFields.name: code
requiredFields.description: Warehouse code - identity field stored locally for immediate access

optionalFields.name: name
optionalFields.description: Warehouse name - optional for enrichment, stored locally

usagePoints.purpose: Provides WarehouseId and WarehouseCode identity fields in order response via local warehouse_cache table join

notes: order-service maintains a local warehouse_cache table containing only essential identity fields (id, code, name) from Warehouse entity. This avoids repeated service calls while keeping DTOs accurate with current Warehouse identity data. Cache is updated on-demand when orders reference new warehouses.
